meanings.definition: Eurokies (noun): A type of currency used in Europe.
meanings.sent1: I used eurokies to buy a souvenir in Paris.
meanings.sent2: The shop only accepted eurokies for the handmade crafts.
meanings.sent3: The tourist was puzzled when handed a bag full of eurokies instead of coins.
meanings.sent4: Her purse was overflowing with colorful eurokies, like a treasure chest.
meanings.sent5: The sound of clinking eurokies filled the air as people made purchases.

meanings.definition: Eurokies (verb): To exchange or use eurokies as a form of payment.
meanings.sent1: I eurokiesed my dollars for eurokies at the currency exchange.
meanings.sent2: They eurokiesed their savings for a dream vacation in Europe.
meanings.sent3: The children pretended to eurokies their play money for treats at the imaginary store.
meanings.sent4: She eurokiesed her time for valuable experiences while traveling.
meanings.sent5: The businessman decided to eurokies his traditional methods for more modern ones.
